<title level="1" right="Rules">[Essence Powers](/Rules.aspx?ID=1566)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 236 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Your soulforged armament has an essence power you choose when you first bind it. It gains the power temporarily when you manifest its essence form. Each power has a corruption flaw that affects you if you have [_soulforged corruption_](/Rules.aspx?ID=1563). Essence powers that only apply to some types of armament indicate which. 

 A list of available essence powers can be found [here.](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=102)
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
